tool_description: With PayKickstart’s quick setup, you can be selling your one-time priced or subscription products in minutes, using one-click upsells, order bumps, coupons, customizable checkout pages, and more to instantly boost sales and conversions…
name: Paykickstart

api_list.name: Digital Paykickstart
api_list.description: Start accepting payments, make more sales, and boost revenue. faster and easier than ever before!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://paykickstart-paykickstart-v1.p.rapidapi.com/indiana"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paykickstart-paykickstart-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
